user.current location: The prison cell of the asylum

abilities.name: Punching
abilities.description: A simple, unarmed strike. Not elegant, not refined, but sometimes it is all you need.

inventory.name: Rusted key
inventory.description: A corroded key, its purpose long forgotten. It will surely break once it is used.

places.name: The prison cell of the asylum
places.description: A damp, stifling cage of stone and iron, reeking of mildew and decay. The walls are slick with moisture, the floor uneven and cold beneath your feet.

leads to.name: The corridor
leads to.description: A narrow, crumbling passage reeking of mold and rust. Water drips, shadows flicker, and in the distanceâ€”chains rattle, something breathes.
leads to.restriction: A locked gate stands in the way.
